## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `concealed` | `concealed` | Define if the component is visible or not. | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                       | Description                                                        |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--lids-loader-size-ratio` | Define the size between the initial and final state of the loader. |
| `--lids-loader-thickness`  | Define the thickness of the ring of the loader.                    |
